allow: Bash(uv run python3 -c "from PIL import Image; img = Image.open(''images/casino.png''); print(f''Size: {img.size}, Mode: {img.mode}'')")

Bash(uv run python3 -c "
# /// script
# dependencies = [''pillow'']
# ///
import os
from PIL import Image

frames_dir = ''images/animation_frames_down''
output_path = ''preview_animation_down.gif''
fps = 30

frame_files = sorted([
    os.path.join(frames_dir, f)
    for f in os.listdir(frames_dir)
    if f.startswith(''frame_'') and f.endswith(''.png'')
])

frames = [Image.open(f).convert(''RGB'') for f in frame_files]
duration_ms = int(1000 / fps)

frames[0].save(
    output_path,
    save_all=True,
    append_images=frames[1:],
    duration=duration_ms,
    loop=0,
    optimize=True
)

print(f''âœ“ Created {output_path}'')
")
